description: EU embargo on Iranian oil exports fully implemented
OPEC announces no production cut despite falling prices
OPEC agrees first production cut in 8 years (1.2M bpd)
U.S. withdraws from JCPOA; reimposes Iran oil sanctions
Drone attack on Saudi Aramco Abqaiq facility (5% global supply offline)
U.S. assassination of Qasem Soleimani; Middle East tensions spike
OPEC+ breakdown; Saudi Arabia launches price war
WTI negative pricing; Brent hits 21-year low (~$19)
Global lockdowns crush oil demand (~30% drop)
Hurricane Ida shuts 95% of Gulf of Mexico production
Russia invades Ukraine; sanctions fears spike prices
U.S. announces 180M barrel SPR release to curb prices
OPEC+ announces 2M bpd production cut despite U.S. opposition
